page.title: 19RECREATION: GAMES AND SPORT
page.content: I like playing{French Skipping}because it is a nice game. You need three people to play French Skipping. Two people have to stand in the ends of the elastic or tights. The person who is doing French Skipping has to make up a few jumps to do on and over the elastic. There are different sections to do. There is normals, double jumpsies, hopsies and blindsies. My favourite sport is{swimming}in the summer. It is nice because it keeps you cool. I like splashing in the water so it goes all over you and I like going under the water and coming back up again .When we have to go out of the swimming pool I say, "Can we have five more minutes?" So when five minutes have gone I say, "I just want one more little swim." Then we get out and have some crisps or something to eat.
